bio.value:
Lori Handeland was born in the USA in 1961. She had already planned to become a writer at the age of 10. She is a two-time winner of the Romance Writers of America Award - once for "Wolf's Kiss" from the "Creatures of the Night" series and also for "The Mommy Quest" from the "Luchetti Brothers" series. She has published over forty novels, novellas and short stories - individually and within various series. She lives with her husband, dog and two sons in Southern Wisconsin, USA.

quoted by Lovelybooks, transladet with DeepL, rights from the Autorphotos by Lori Handeland
